title: A pastoral letter from the four Catholic bishops to the lay-Catholics of England
author: Leyburn, John, 1620-1702.
notes: Signed at end: John Bishop of Adramite. V.A., Bonaventure Bishop of Madaura. V.A., Philip Bishop of Aureliople. V.A., James Bishop of Callipoli. V.A.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
